title: iMac $500 Nano-Texture Display vs. Standard Display - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: iMac $500 Nano-Texture Display vs. Standard Display - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
description:
Apple's new 2020 iMac offers a $500 nano-texture display option‚Äîa feature which reduces glare on the screen. However, what are the tradeoffs? And is it worth $500 for the upgrade? Let's find out while Krazy Ken unwraps the iMac and tests it; you'll get his raw reactions and analysis.
